_meta.description: D365 Finance & Operations object creation templates and configurations
_meta.purpose: Unified template system for creating all types of D365 F&O objects

model.description: Create a new D365 Finance & Operations model container

objectName.description: Name of the model to create

layer.description: Application layer for the model

outputPath.description: Output path for the model structure (relative to X++ metadata folder root, leave empty for container root)

class.description: Create a new X++ class with basic structure

objectName.description: Name of the class to create

modelName.description: Target model where the class will be created

layer.description: Application layer for the class

classMetadataTemplate.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<AxClass xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <Name>{{className}}</Name>
    <SourceCode>
        <Declaration><![CDATA[
/// <summary>
/// {{description}}
/// </summary>
{{#if isAbstract}}abstract {{/if}}{{#if isFinal}}final {{/if}}class {{className}}{{#if extends}} extends {{extends}}{{/if}}{{#if implements}}
    implements {{#each implements}}{{this}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{/if}}
{
}
        ]]></Declaration>
    </SourceCode>
</AxClass>

enumExtensionMetadataTemplate.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<AxEnumExtension xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <n>{{objectName}}</n>
    <TargetEnum>{{targetEnum}}</TargetEnum>
    <EnumValues>
        <!-- Add new enum values here -->
    </EnumValues>
</AxEnumExtension>

viewMetadataTemplate.content:
{{objectName}} {{#if label}}{{/if}} {{#if helpText}}{{helpText}}{{/if}} {{#if dataSource}} {{dataSource}} {{dataSource}}
{{else}}{{/if}}

formMetadataTemplate.content:
{{objectName}} {{#if label}}{{label}}{{/if}} {{#if helpText}}{{helpText}}{{/if}} {{#if dataSource}} {{dataSource}} {{dataSource}}
 {{/if}} SimpleList

reportMetadataTemplate.content:
{{objectName}} {{#if label}}{{label}}{{/if}} {{#if helpText}}{{helpText}}{{/if}} {{#if dataSource}} {{dataSource}} {{dataSource}}
 {{/if}} ReportDesign

macroMetadataTemplate.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<AxMacro xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <n>{{objectName}}</n>
    <SourceCode>
        <Declaration><![CDATA[
#if.{{objectName}}
#define.{{objectName}}(1)
// Add macro definition here
#endif
        ]]></Declaration>
    </SourceCode>
</AxMacro>
